net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dnd5e_DiceRoller_roll
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
This is the roller to roll dice from an array of provided RollExpressions.
When ran with a token selected, _dnd5e_lastRolledExpression is set to the processed RoleExpression[]

arg(0) = RollExpression[]
arg(1) = (optional) the amount to multiply the totalRolls property, normally used by DiceRoller when rolling child expressions
arg(2) = (otional) Are we making rolls for the action or target? 0 for action and 1 for target

Returns: The RollExpression array with all of the results
